basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Oliver Hodge Memorial Endowed Scholarship

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are pursuing a graduate degree in Educational Leadership. Eligibility Requirements This scholarship is open to any student pursuing a graduate degree in Educational Leadership Minimum 2.75 GPA Demonstrates through a personal statement a desire to continue working in the Oklahoma Public School System Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_College is Education and Prof Studies

criteria.description: SIS_Major is Educational Leadership   or SIS_Major is Educational Administration
